member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch
member.summary: Provides a simple on/off switch that controls debugging and tracing output.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name and description.
member.param: The name to display on a user interface.
The description of the switch.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name, description, and default switch value.
member.param: The name to display on the user interface.
The description of the switch.
The default value of the switch.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the switch is enabled or disabled.
member.returns: true if the switch is enabled; otherwise, false. The default is false.
member.exception: The caller does not have the correct permission.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.BooleanSwitch.OnValueChanged
member.summary: Determines whether the new value of the property can be parsed as a Boolean value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener
member.summary: Provides the default output methods and behavior for tracing.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with "Default" as its property value.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.Fail(System.String)
member.summary: Emits or displays a message and a stack trace for an assertion that always fails.
member.param: The message to emit or display.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.Fail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Emits or displays detailed messages and a stack trace for an assertion that always fails.
member.param: The message to emit or display.
The detailed message to emit or display.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the output to the OutputDebugString function and to the method.
member.param: The message to write to OutputDebugString and .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the output to the OutputDebugString function and to the method, followed by a carriage return and line feed (\r\n).
member.param: The message to write to OutputDebugString and .

member.summary: Allows , , , , and events through.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Trace
member.summary: Provides a set of methods and properties that help you trace the execution of your code. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Assert(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks for a condition; if the condition is false, displays a message box that shows the call stack.
member.param: The conditional expression to evaluate. If the condition is true, a failure message is not sent and the message box is not displayed.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Assert(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for a condition; if the condition is false, outputs a specified message and displays a message box that shows the call stack.
member.param: The conditional expression to evaluate. If the condition is true, the specified message is not sent and the message box is not displayed.
The message to send to the collection.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Assert(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for a condition; if the condition is false, outputs two specified messages and displays a message box that shows the call stack.
member.param: The conditional expression to evaluate. If the condition is true, the specified messages are not sent and the message box is not displayed.
The message to send to the collection.
The detailed message to send to the collection.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.Trace.AutoFlush
member.summary: Gets or sets whether should be called on the after every write.
member.returns: true if is called on the after every write; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Flushes the output buffer, and then closes the .

member.summary: Emits an error message, and a detailed error message.

A detailed message to emit.

member.summary: Flushes the output buffer, and causes buffered data to be written to the .

member.summary: Increases the current by one.

member.summary: Gets or sets the indent level.
member.returns: The indent level. The default is zero.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of spaces in an indent.
